entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as seeing bursts of green and red light through the window, indicating that he is aware of the Death Eaters' presence. He also sees Grawp meandering past and Ginny and Tonks fighting with their wands drawn.

entities.name: grawp
entities.description: Grawp is described as a giant who is swinging a stone gargoyle and roaring his displeasure. Harry hopes that Grawp will step on some of the Death Eaters.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as fighting with her wand drawn, sending a well-aimed jinx into a crowd of fighters below. Ron praises her for it.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is described as fighting with her wand drawn alongside Ginny, and both are at the next window which is missing several panes.

entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is described as leading a small group of students past, with his gray hair flying in the dust. He roars in approval when Ginny sends a jinx into the crowd.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are described as being very near to entering the castle, with bursts of green and red light visible from the window. Harry knows they must be close because of this.

relationships.description: Harry is aware of the Death Eaters' presence, as indicated by the bursts of green and red light visible from the window.
Harry hopes that Grawp will step on some of the Death Eaters, indicating a desire for help from the giant.
Ginny is fighting against the Death Eaters with her wand drawn, sending a well-aimed jinx into their crowd.
Tonks is fighting against the Death Eaters with her wand drawn, alongside Ginny at the next window which is missing several panes.
Aberforth is leading a small group of students past, with his gray hair flying in the dust as he roars in approval when Ginny sends a jinx into the crowd.
